claims.object: Object to which the location of another object is related

surface_layer.definition: An object that serves as the basis for determining the spatial location of another object.

deep_layer.mechanism: Provides a fixed point or area in space for relating the position of other objects.
deep_layer.origin: Derived from spatial geometry and coordinate systems.

examples: A map legend used to locate landmarks.
A building used to describe the location of a nearby park.
